alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:43AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of East Carroll and Madison Parishes, northwestern Warren and Issaquena Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 943 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shelburn to 6 miles northwest of Afton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lake Providence, Millikin and Shelburn around 950 AM CDT. Gassoway around 955 AM CDT. Mansford around 1005 AM CDT. Omega around 1010 AM CDT. Eagle Bend and Grace around 1015 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Mayersville and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi.
